name: Lyra 1.4 Beta
description:
Current Version V1.4

Patch Notes:

Pistol, Assault Rifle, Shotgun now do more damage

Elimination Mode is no longer 2V2 is now 4V4

AI no longer is OP AF

Coming in V1.5

AI buffed by 20%

New Free For All game mode

Assault Rife, Pistol, Shotgun Nerfed by 10%

Coming in V1.6

Competitive Game Mode Compete for a rank

Online Multiplayer (Maybe)

Sniper Rifle

First Person ADS Mode can be toggled of if you don't like

Coming in 2.0 Beta

Online Multiplayer

Weapon Skins(Can be obtained for free)

Full First Person Mode Can be toggled of(Might get removed)

New weapons

3 New Game Modes Custom Games, Search and destroy, Dog Tags

Player Skins(Can be obtained for free)

New Maps
